                java.lang.String PrintResolutionHeight,
                java.lang.String NumOfColorsPallete,
                java.lang.String ImportantColors,
                java.lang.String[][] ColorArray)
        Image constructor
        Parameters:
        Signature - File format signature
        Size - Size of file
        AppSpec1 - Always set to 00 00
        AppSpec2 - Always set to 00 00
        Offset - Offset size to the pixel data
        DIBsize - Size of header
        Width - Image width
        Height - Image Height
        NumofPlanes - Number of planes on image
        BitperPx - Size per pixel : 24 bit
        CompressionArray - Compression array standards
        RawBitmapData - Image size without header
        PrintResolutionWidth - Screen resolution width
        PrintResolutionHeight - Screen resolution height
        NumOfColorsPallete - Number of colors in the pallete
        ImportantColors - Important colors
        ColorArray - Image pixel colors
